judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones and Bell, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Morrow. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James A. Reilly, David E. Cohen and Reilly & Cohen, for appellant, submitted a brief.
Thomas A. Waggoner, Jr., and J. C. Classlmrn, for appellee, submitted a brief.
casebody.head_matter:
Shiery, Appellant, v. Shiery.
Submitted May 22, 1950.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones and Bell, JJ.
June 26, 1950:
James A. Reilly, David E. Cohen and Reilly & Cohen, for appellant, submitted a brief.
Thomas A. Waggoner, Jr., and J. C. Classlmrn, for appellee, submitted a brief.
